name: MultipleSelectionControl
summary: MultipleSelectionControl is a simple multiselection segment control view
description: MultipleSelectionControl is a simple multiselection segment control view. It is realized with UIStackView and custom UIView subclass - Segment. Segment is based on UIButton. There is delegate for handling MultiSelectionSlideSegmentedControl events such as select new item, and select many items. MultipleSelectionControl provides to select many items by sliding
